titles.title: A bill to provide that no funds may be expended in fiscal year 1994 by the Department of the Interior for the conduct of preleasing and leasing activities in the Atlantic for Outer Continental Shelf Lease Sale 164 in the April 1992 proposal for the Outer Contintental Shelf Natural Gas and Oil Resource Management Comprehensive Program, 1992-1997.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6466)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Prohibits expending FY 1994 funds for preleasing and leasing activities in the Atlantic for a certain Outer Continental Shelf Lease sale specified in a proposal for the Outer Continental Shelf Natural Gas and Oil Resource Management Comprehensive Program, 1992-1997.
